subtitles.text: Yes, so the 32nd Worst Law Superstar Road of Stars, or Worst Law Superstar Star for short, has begun!
I could say it, I could say it!
I could say it! I can now say it without looking at the script!
Now I can say it without looking at the script, and since we're here, I'll give you a little cue to get started.
I'd like to light the torch to signal the beginning.
And at this point, I'd like to call out to the audience.
The man who will be calling out the call for the lighting of the torches is a man who is well suited to a campsite full of nature.
Oh, my God! It's out of the wild!
I've become XANA! Izuki! XANAKONSO! good, good, good ... I'd like to play a little game on the kijiji and ka campfire!
It's called Cat Posin' the Legend of the Fallen Fallen.
Falling Down is a classic campfire game that even the little ones can easily understand!
We all clap our hands as we play!
When I, Orakio, say fell fell fell fell, the rumored four should ask what fell fell fell.
If I say "a raw bone," hold your head so you don't get hit on the head.
If I say apple, put your palms on top of each other and turn your hands upward as if you are catching an apple falling from above.
If I say "thunder," hold your palm down with both hands so that your palm will not be taken.
When I say orakia, do the hand pose.
When I say Fujita, do the Niebla movement.
The rhythm will gradually get faster and faster, and anyone who makes a mistake will not be allowed to do it.
The first person to make a mistake is the one who does not eat the marshmallow.
Let's play the game in the front row, shall we?
If I say I fell, please ask me what fell.

Okay, let's see who was the slowest, and then we'll do the next one, and then we'll do the next one, and then we'll do the next one, and then the slowest one will have to be the car. I wonder if the staff will see that I've written two drafts in a row.
